subject: Career
title: Remote Onboarding: The Critical Window
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Remote Onboarding: The Critical Window.

hook.text: Day one: you open your laptop at home. No office tour. No desk neighbor. Just you and a Slack invite.

buildup.text: Remote onboarding fails when it replicates in-office onboarding on Zoom. Different medium needs different design.

discovery.text: BambooHR data: employees with structured onboarding are 58% more likely to stay three years.

twist.text: The social component matters most. Assigning a 'buddy' for the first 90 days doubles integration speed.

climax.text: A great remote onboarding: written handbook, assigned buddy, weekly check-ins, and a real first project within two.

punchline.text: First impressions happen remotely now. Design them.

quiz.question: What makes remote onboarding most effective?
options: Structured process with a buddy, handbook, and real early projects
Sending a laptop and hoping for the best
